title: System
description: System management and configuration skills for agent operations including API key management

read_agent_api_key.title: Read Agent API Key
read_agent_api_key.description: Retrieve the API key for the agent. If no API key exists, generates and sets a new one.

regenerate_agent_api_key.title: Regenerate Agent API Key
regenerate_agent_api_key.description: Generate a new API key for the agent, replacing any existing key.

list_autonomous_tasks.title: List Autonomous Tasks
list_autonomous_tasks.description: List all autonomous task configurations for the agent.

add_autonomous_task.title: Add Autonomous Task
add_autonomous_task.description: Add a new autonomous task configuration to the agent.

delete_autonomous_task.title: Delete Autonomous Task
delete_autonomous_task.description: Delete an autonomous task configuration from the agent.

edit_autonomous_task.title: Edit Autonomous Task
edit_autonomous_task.description: Edit an existing autonomous task configuration for the agent.
